instructions: LWK files are not meant to be opened. Instead, you can place the LWK file in the "licenses" folder in the LightWave 3D installation directory to register the software, and the LightWave 3D (11.0.3 or later) software references it.
For example, to register the trial version of LightWave 3D 2020, place the LWK file in the following directory (depending on your operating system):
While LightWave 3D references LWK files, you can still open them with a plain text editor to view the license key.
